 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁקְמָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==sycomore tree== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁיקְמָא‎</span> ,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No.332</sup>; hence Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">συκάηινος</span> ***mulberry*** [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup> Fremdw.23</sup>); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁקְמִים‎</span> [[Amos.7.14|Amos 7:14]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁקְמוֺתָם‎</span> [[Ps.78.47|Ps 78:47]] — ***sycomore, ficus sycomorus*** [[BDB#Linn|Linn]] ([[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB397ff.</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Flora of Syria 730</sup>; Hast. DB under the word) a common tree [[Isa.9.9|Isa 9:9]], growing in the Shephela [[1Kgs.10.27|1Kgs 10:27]]=[[2Chr.1.15|2Chr 1:15]]=[[2Chr.9.27|2Chr 9:27]],[[1Chr.27.28|1Chr 27:28]] as property [[Ps.78.47|Ps 78:47]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶּפֶן‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺלֵס שִׁקְמִים‎</span> [[Amos.7.14|Amos 7:14]] ***a tender of sycomores*** (see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַָלס‎</span>]).
